derivation: presumed to be the 'constructive' or genitival form of אַו ; short for H185 (אַוָּה);
outline:
1. or, rather
    1. implying that the latter choice is preferred
    2. or if, introducing an example to be seen under a particular principle
    3. (in series) either...or, whether...or
    4. if perchance
    5. except, or else
  2. whether, not the least, if, otherwise, also, and, then
kjv_def: also, and, either, if, at the least, [idiom] nor, or, otherwise, then, whether.
strongs_def: desire (and so probably in Proverbs 31:4); hence (by way of alternative) or, also if
